> > What's wrong with forcing production code to change only to 
> make it more
> > testable?
> 
> I think that a testing tool can suggest you to change your code but 
> shouldn't force you to do it.  You - and not the testing tool 
> - are the 
> one knowing what the code should do.  

I agree. I don't think a specific tool should form decisions like this. But
I do think that I as a programmer should be willing to make changes in
production code for the sake of testability.

Chris
